summary: This mod takes all the Skaven creatures created by MrCasual/Buffscale McThundertail/Haishao, and adds them to the game. These creatures are based on the world of Warhammer Fantasy. You can summon Skaven Archers, Ogres, Peons, Riders, Assassins, Globadiers (gas bomb throwers), and Leaders. They wear armor accordingly and carry weapons as well.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000]Skaven Mounts and Followers [/color][/b][color=#00ff00]1.2.1[/color]. The DLC Dragonborn is required. No Scripts, No SKSE

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Française [/color]

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18012105572916616015484273.jpg][img]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/21//18012105572916616015484273.jpg[/img][/url]

This mod takes all the Skaven creatures created by MrCasual (with Buffscale McThundertail and Haishao) and adds them to the game. These creatures are based on the world of Warhammer Fantasy. You can summon Skaven Archers, Ogres, Peons, Riders, Assassins, Globadiers (gas bomb throwers), and Leaders. They wear armor accordingly and carry weapons as well.

You have also a version that spawns these guys in many places[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67204/?] Skaven Encounters by kekechi [/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/X68ng6x.gif[/img]

[b][color=#ff0000]STAFF[/color][/b] (Wabbajack model) to throw gas bombs...

You can buy a Gas Bomb Thrower at Warmaiden's, and in the Drunken Huntsman (Whiterun)

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18012105572716616015484272.jpg][img]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/21//18012105572716616015484272.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000]COMPANIONS - MOUNTS [/color][/b]with Books/Spells

With this mod, you can summon 23 Companions: 19 with single Skaven (the 4 Ogres are mountable) + you can ride 4 Skeevers with Skaven

To have the SUMMONABLE Companions/Mounts, you must buy the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”, at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude).

With the books, you have the spells....

The creature is following you, if you do not want any more,you have another book/spell to unsummon this follower ! (You can't trade with these companions)

[img]https://i.imgur.com/58XJP6f.gif[/img]

[b][color=#ff0000]FOLLOWERS with INCUBATED EGGS [/color][/b](3 Globadiers/Archer/Elite/Horned/Soldier/Assassin/Warrior)

This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs with the fire of the forge, and quickly create a horde/army of LITTLE SKAVENS (5, 15, 50, MORE ? ...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !) that are following you as if you were their mother !

To obtain these eggs, simply bring any “XXX Egg ” found with some [color=#00ff00]MERCHANTS[/color] (in [color=#00ff00]WHITERUN[/color]: Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare; in [color=#00ff00]RIFTEN[/color]: Keeravia at the Bee and Barb, Elgrim at Elgrim’s Elixirs, Marise Aravel, Vekel at the Ragged Flagorn in the Ratways; in [color=#00ff00]SOLITUDE[/color]: Angeline at Angeline’s Aromatics, Corpulus at Winking Skeever, Sayma at Bits and Pieces, Addvar) to a forge and create the "Incubated XXX Egg" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into little creatures.

When your creatures die, remember to loot their corpses for more eggs ! (The eggs are also in the dead creatures)

These Skaven are very aggressive.

If you have my other mods with Incubated Eggs: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55592/?]Incubated Eggs[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76666/?]Curious Birds Mounts and Armies [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76681/?]Chimeras Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76864/?]New Gryphons Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76818/?]Snails and Slugs of Skyrim[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77311/?]Repopulate with Mushrooms[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73785/?]Griffins Mounts and Armies[/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68187/?]Gerbils Mounts and Followers [/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68832/?] Skaven Mounts and Followers [/url]or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55520/?] Incubated Winged Chocobos [/url], in order to find these eggs at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game.



[color=#ff0000][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/color] (very important)

1) You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game to obtain the 22 books...(Normally, this is done automatically)

2) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! to obtain the books (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !).If you have not bought a book/spell, NO PROBLEM, you can always put again this mod at the bottom of the list… buy the books, etc...

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”,at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whitherun/Blancherive) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

3) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not



[b][color=#ff0000]CREDITS[/color][/b]

Thanks to MrCasual (with Buffscale McThundertail and Haishao) for the Meshes of these creatures (with the new weapons) in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54028/?] The Skaven - A Warhammer fantasy race mod resource [/url] ( Thanks also to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65134/?]VICN [/url]for Riekling compatible clothes and armors: Draugr helmets and Mad Masker Gasmasks)

Textures of the Skeevers/Skaven by Bellyache in his Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621] Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack [/url]("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me")

Kahjiit Raj in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16831/?] Golden Egg Treasure Hunt [/url] for the textures(with:Wyeko,struckdumb,super_chicken,bigsteve7743,Enchantedgal,WanderingSoul,kuschelirmel,Wisdoms_Pe,ttainted_sharben) of some Eggs
author: gg77

New in the Version 1.2.1: Increased the damage caused by the gas bomb (only for your avatar)

New in the Version 1.2: You can buy a Gas Bomb Thrower at Warmaiden's and in the Drunken Huntsman (Whiterun)
